name: places/ChIJE6RC1URZwokRe_20IGhbtMY
formattedAddress: 414 E 75th St 4th Floor, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 414 E 75th St 4th Floor, New York, NY 10021-3442, USA

originalText.text:
Dr. Pagirsky is an exceptional provider.  He performed my son's second neuropsych eval in 2020 (1st was 2018) which finally presented a true picture of his learning disabilities.

His reports are much more thorough, detailed, and easy to understand than others I've seen. With his eval, we were finally able to properly diagnose my son and get him the support he needs (after 3+ years of improper diagnosis/care).

Dr. Matt is extremely warm, engaging, thorough, thoughtful and takes the proper time to ensure both child and parent clarity on testing and results.

His evaluations include multiple testing forms to ensure all bases are covered and the full picture of your child's needs are reviewed.

In follow up reviews (for us in 2022), Dr. Matt has a clear memory of your child's prior eval with him and easily recalls all details needed to support your child.

FINALLY, someone that is able to perfectly outline the learning disabilities I've been trying to get his educators & the DOE to identify for years.  Thank you Dr. Matt!!
